title: @Riot, I'm cool with region forums being closed in favour of Boards but keep a global boards too.

replies.body:
I think you can just go to other regions' board and post.

So no need for a global one I say.
Basically what Sekai said. With the ability to access other region Boards it would make no sense to have an active Global forum.
Well the NA one was the only one for a while and I assumed it was a global one.
